\section{Froala Editor Demo}
Froala Editor is a lightweight WYSIWYG HTML Editor written in Javascript that enables rich text
editing capabilities for your applications.\par
\subsection{Key Features}
\begin{itemize}
  \item \textbf{Fast and lightweight} - Only 50KB gzipped

  \item \textit{Mobile friendly} - Works on iOS and Android

  \item \underline{Extensible} - Over 30 plugins available

  \item Cross-browser compatible - Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and IE11+
\end{itemize}
\subsection{Text Formatting}
The editor supports various text formats including \textbf{bold}, \textit{italic}, \underline{underline},
and \sout{strikethrough}. You can also use \texttt{inline code} for technical content.\par
\subsubsection{Special Characters}
Mathematical expressions like x\textsuperscript{2} + y\textsuperscript{2} = z\textsuperscript{2} and
chemical formulas like H\textsubscript{2}SO\textsubscript{4} are supported.\par
\subsection{Tables}
\begin{tabular}{lll}
  \textbf{Feature}  & \textbf{Basic} & \textbf{Pro} \\
  Rich Text Editing & Yes            & Yes          \\
  Image Upload      & No             & Yes          \\
  Collaboration     & No             & Yes          \\
\end{tabular}
\subsection{Links and Images}
